column2: I am not surprised that you do not know of me. I have learned that none of the documentation that was written during my time survived the ages. No matter, my name is Nesma. I once was a princess of Egypt who knows how long ago by now. Though I no longer go by the title of princess, for it does not hold much meaning anymore. So calling me Nesma would be just fine, dear.
How long have you been in this place?
